input: The bear looked up at the girl and it was almost as if he was smiling at her. [SEP] How long did the bear smile at the girl? [SEP] 5 seconds

Mama kept her mink jacket, a family hand-me-down, safe from time in a stopbox, and lent the capturador to my uncle for his stamp collection. [SEP] How long was the capturador lent to the uncle for? [SEP] 10 seconds
